languages.text: {n}Толпа отшатывается от окрика, словно ваш голос их ударил — впрочем, это недалеко от истины. Люди прячут глаза и сжимаются под вашим испепеляющим взглядом, шарящим по людской массе. Наконец, одного трясущегося смутьяна выпихивают вперед.{/n}

{n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа отшатывается от окрика, словно ваш голос их ударил — впрочем, это недалеко от истины. Люди прячут глаза и сжимаются под вашим испепеляющим взглядом, шарящим по людской массе. Наконец, одного трясущегося смутьяна выпихивают вперед.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck by it — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze sweeping over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

{n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck by it — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze sweeping over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

{n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

{n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

{n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆は物理的に抑圧されたかのように、こちらの怒声に萎縮した。彼らは目をそらし、こちらの燃えるような視線に怯えながら、集まったろくでなし連中を見渡した。そしてついに、身体を震わすひとりの民衆扇動家が前に押し出された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆は物理的に抑圧されたかのように、こちらの怒声に萎縮した。彼らは目をそらし、こちらの燃えるような視線に怯えながら、集まったろくでなし連中を見渡した。そしてついに、身体を震わすひとりの民衆扇動家が前に押し出された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到你洪亮的声音之后，人群向后退去，就仿佛挨了打一样，尽管他们确实离挨打不远了。他们纷纷移开视线，在你灼灼逼人的目光下向后退去。到了最后，浑身颤抖的煽动者被推到了前面。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你洪亮的声音之后，人群向后退去，就仿佛挨了打一样，尽管他们确实离挨打不远了。他们纷纷移开视线，在你灼灼逼人的目光下向后退去。到了最后，浑身颤抖的煽动者被推到了前面。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La multitud se aleja de tu estruendosa voz como si hubieras empleado la violencia, si bien aquello no dista demasiado de la realidad. Apartan los ojos y se acobardan ante tu ardiente mirada a medida que recorre al gentío. Finalmente, un agitador tembloroso es empujado hacia delante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La multitud se aleja de tu estruendosa voz como si hubieras empleado la violencia, si bien aquello no dista demasiado de la realidad. Apartan los ojos y se acobardan ante tu ardiente mirada a medida que recorre al gentío. Finalmente, un agitador tembloroso es empujado hacia delante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre voix retentissante fait reculer la foule comme si vous l'aviez frappée, ce qui n'est pas loin de la vérité. Chacun tente d'éviter d'attirer votre attention tandis que votre regard furieux balaie l'assemblée. Un mouvement de foule rejette finalement un agitateur tremblotant devant vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre voix retentissante fait reculer la foule comme si vous l'aviez frappée, ce qui n'est pas loin de la vérité. Chacun tente d'éviter d'attirer votre attention tandis que votre regard furieux balaie l'assemblée. Un mouvement de foule rejette finalement un agitateur tremblotant devant vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Menge schreckt vor deiner donnernden Stimme zurück wie vor einem körperlichen Angriff – was gar nicht weit von der Wahrheit entfernt ist. Sie senken die Augen und zucken unter deinem flammenden Blick zusammen, der das versammelte Gesindel mustert. Schließlich wird ein zitternder Unruhestifter nach vorne geschoben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menge schreckt vor deiner donnernden Stimme zurück wie vor einem körperlichen Angriff – was gar nicht weit von der Wahrheit entfernt ist. Sie senken die Augen und zucken unter deinem flammenden Blick zusammen, der das versammelte Gesindel mustert. Schließlich wird ein zitternder Unruhestifter nach vorne geschoben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalık, gürleyen sesin karşısında fiziksel bir darbe yemişçesine siniyor. Ki bu, gerçekten çok da uzak değil. Gözlerini kaçırıyor ve toplanmış kalabalığın üzerinde gezinen bakışların karşısında iki büklüm oluyorlar. Sonunda kalabalığı kışkırtanlardan biri titreyerek öne çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd shrinks away from your booming voice as if physically struck — although that isn't far from the truth. They avert their eyes and cower under your burning gaze as it sweeps over the gathered riffraff. Finally, one trembling rabble-rouser is pushed forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalık gürleyen sesin karşısında fiziksel bir darbe almışcasına siniyor ki aslında gerçekler bundan çok da farklı sayılmaz. Gözlerini kaçırıyor ve toplanmış kalabalığın üzerinde gezen bakışların karşısında iki büklüm oluyorlar. Sonunda kalabalığı kışkırtanlardan biri titreyerek ileri çıkıyor.{/n}
